transcript:
the princesses' apartments. The maid with the decanter in her haste had not closed the door (everything in the house was done in haste at that time), and Pierre and Anna Mikhdylovna in passing instinctively glanced into the room, where Prince Vasili and the eldest princess were sit- ting close together talking. Seeing them pass, Prince Vasili drew back with obvious impa- tience, while the princess jumped up and with 
a gesture of desperation slammed the door with all her might.
